text: Bjorn Seguin (born 4 April 1990) is an American male badminton player. In 2014, he won silver medals at the Pan Am Badminton Championships in men's singles and mixed team events. == Achievements == ===Pan Am Championships=== Men's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Venue !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- |- style="background:#CDFFF4" | align="center"|2017 | align="left"|Sports City Coliseum, Havana, Cuba |align="left"| Osleni Guerrero |align="left"|14–21, 13–21 |style="text-align:left;
